net.proteusframework.core.locale

Class LocalizedLocale

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.locale.AbstractLocalizedObject
      • net.proteusframework.core.locale.LocalizedText
        • net.proteusframework.core.locale.LocalizedLocale
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CharSequence, Cloneable, LocalizedObject, TextSource

    public final class LocalizedLocale
extends LocalizedText
    LocalizedObject implementation that returns the language as the value. This implementation should not be persisted. The display language is updated when LocalizedObject.localeChanged(LocaleContext) is called.
    Author:
    Russell Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)
